Okay, okay. I admit it, just trying to stir the pot, but I guess it boiled=
 over! But it did get me more info. 
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
omFrom: lisby@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 18:45:31 +0000Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Re: I don't know about that!!




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "b=
abiarz3" <babiarz3@...> wrote:>> Let's not twist words here. Show me where =
Chris has said you "only"> get false communication or bad guys. > BTW I tho=
ught we were trying to get the negativity behind us and move> on to constru=
ctive discussion. Guess that's more of the wishy-washy> depends on what my =
hair feels like doing ways here. from his own blog (clipped, but not otherw=
ise altered):"Wednesday, November 28, 2007The Box has hit the fan!Current m=
ood: distressed"I have recentlybeen made aware that there are several repli=
ca versions of thisdevice being sold. I have also been told of another devi=
ce that canbe purchased for very little from any electronics merchant andal=
tered by hand, producing what some consider to be results. As Iexpected, th=
e samples that people have sent me are *nothing morethan timed radio scans =
that have no validity.* [emphasis mine]"These new "radio scanners" are not =
only *a waste of money* forpeople looking to do research with them in hopes=
 of havingeffective communication with the other side, but may in fact be *=
verydangerous*. Should demonic and other negative entities learn to usethes=
e falsedevices, *the results could be devastating.*"...The Catholic Church =
... predicted the widespread sale of*false communication devices* as far ba=
ck as last year. *I have recentlybegun to receive requests from individuals=
 asking for help to closenegative doorways and portals that they believe th=
ey opened usingtheir purchased Telephone to the Dead replica*. Others are c=
laiming> that I am a fraud because their purchased device doesn't produceth=
e positive results I have been fortunate enough to have."So let's go throug=
 this again:*nothing more than timed radio scans that have no validity.**a =
waste of money**very dangerous**the results could be devastating.**false co=
mmunication devices**I have recently begun to receive requests from individ=
uals asking forhelp to close negative doorways and portals that they believ=
e theyopened using their purchased Telephone to the Dead replica.*As you se=
e, there are two statements that Chris is making--so much forhe's always co=
nsistant, which I believe was an earlier statement thatyou made.1. The new =
boxes create accidental timed radio scans only.2. The new boxes are very da=
ngerous because they draw negative results.I'm not sure how the two stateme=
nts can stand together, but in eithercase, his opinion is clearly not compl=
imentary toward the rest of thebox users besides the four of the 30 he says=
, in the same post, "havebeen identified."Rather cheeky and insulting and w=
rong, HMO. But if he just goes ondoing sessions like the one APSR recorded,=
 I will continue to laud them.Ann
